name: RoboBot 2000
shortDescription: Experience the ultimate remote control fun with RoboBot 2000!

name: TechPet
shortDescription: Adopt your own TechPet and have endless fun with this interactive robotic companion!

name: TransformaCar
shortDescription: Get ready for action-packed adventures with the TransformaCar, the incredible transforming robot vehicle!

name: LearnBot
shortDescription: Spark curiosity and learn with the LearnBot, the educational robot designed to make learning fun!

name: DinoCompanion
shortDescription: Meet DinoCompanion, your loyal robotic dinosaur pet that will bring endless joy and adventure!

name: RoboPup
shortDescription: Adopt RoboPup and experience the love and companionship of a robotic dog!

name: MegaTruck
shortDescription: Get ready for mega-sized action with MegaTruck, the colossal transforming robot truck!

name: CodeMaster
shortDescription: Unlock the world of coding and programming with CodeMaster, the interactive educational robot!
